deprecated_notify.title: The Netgear LTE notify service is changing
deprecated_notify.description:
The Netgear LTE notify service was previously set up via YAML configuration.

This created a service for a specified recipient without having to include the phone number.

Please adjust any automations or scripts you may have to use the `{name}` service and include target for specifying a recipient.

import_failure.title: The Netgear LTE integration failed to import
import_failure.description:
The Netgear LTE notify service was previously set up via YAML configuration.

An error occurred when trying to communicate with the device while attempting to import the configuration to the UI.

Please remove the Netgear LTE notify section from your YAML configuration and set it up in the UI instead.
